Visit the ancient city of Babylon in Mesopotamia to witness its historical significance and learn about its rich cultural heritage.
Explore the early human settlements in Africa, such as Olduvai Gorge in Tanzania, to gain insight into the evolution of human civilization.
Attend the first Olympics in ancient Greece to witness the birthplace of the modern Olympic Games and experience the spirit of competition.
Visit the Library of Celsus in Ephesus, Turkey, to see the impressive architecture and ancient scrolls that have been preserved for centuries.
Attend a symposium with the great philosopher Socrates to engage in philosophical discussions and learn from his teachings.
